content:
# I have successfully harvested 10 iron ores into my inventory. 
# Now I can insert these iron ores into the Stone Furnace to start smelting them into iron plates.

# 1. Insert 10 iron ores into the Stone Furnace.
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, get_entities({Prototype.StoneFurnace})[0], quantity=10)

# 2. Let's check the inventory and the status of the furnace after inserting the iron ores.
print(f"Inventory after inserting iron ore: {inspect_inventory()}")
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")
